Author: sunsetbarrage
Text: You are right, i know this and I used to go to therapy but this was when I still felt and looked "normal". It's left me with stomach issues and fucked up teeth but you are right. I just felt weak for relapsing and I'm 21 years old I'm tired of still feeling like I'm 14 üòî thank you for your kind words, I wish you the best as well ‚ô•Ô∏è

Author: bumbumboleji
Text: Dude, please please consider trying to get some help and not throw up before it becomes an ingrained habit.   You can legit die, it‚Äôs not worth it, and if you keep going the fun things you will have to look forward to include but not limited to, hair falling out, puffy face, destroying your teeth (so embarrassing looking like a meth head) bad skin, bad breath, digestive issues, nails that break, and that‚Äôs just looking at it from a vanity perspective.   The worst thing is I get it, it sucks that people are so different to you when you are one weight vs another, but please hun as someone who‚Äôs struggled with this for a long long time it is not worth it.   I wish you all the best
